history.proof: intros. unfold ex_pseries, PS_opp in *. hauto l: on depth: 3use: is_pseries_opp, ex_pseries_incr_1.

exceptions.tactic: intros K V a x H.
intros K' V a x H.
intros K' V' a x H.
intros K' V' a' x H.
intros K' V' a' x' H.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V x : K H : ex_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (a k)) Unable to unify "exists l : ?V, is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n ?M2364 k) (PS_incr_1 ?M2363 k)) l" with "exists l : V, is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (opp (a k))) l".

original: intros K V a x H. unfold ex_pseries, PS_opp in *. intros [l Hl]. apply ex_pseries_incr_1. apply is_pseries_opp in Hl. apply Hl.
